title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1590.11 - Length of juror service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1590.11 - Length of juror service

State Regulations

In all counties except Erie, Monroe, Onondaga, Niagara and Oneida, in the Fourth Judicial Department, the County

Court judge assigned to a jury term may extend juror service any period of time
up to the start of the next jury term in that county. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1590.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
